comments.body: is there a test demonstrating what bug this change is fixing?

I'm confused now about TestConvertSliceStringToDeletionPropagation is ok, but TestAppsGroupBackwardCompatibility throw a nil pointer panic
```
I1113 12:05:12.864854  107721 panic.go:679] DELETE /apis/apps/v1/namespaces/default/deployments/test-deployment2?propagationPolicy=Orphan: (463.225Âµs) 0 [Go-http-client/1.1 127.0.0.1:44308]
E1113 12:05:12.865064  107721 runtime.go:76] Observed a panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
goroutine 174233 [running]:
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters.(*timeoutHandler).ServeHTTP.func1.1(0xc13aecac60)
	/home/prow/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters/timeout.go:108 +0x107
panic(0x3cae260, 0x753b9d0)
	/usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:679 +0x1b2
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/apis/meta/v1.Convert_Slice_string_To_Pointer_v1_DeletionPropagation(...)
	/home/prow/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/apis/meta/v1/conversion.go:360
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/apis/meta/v1.autoConvert_url_Values_To_v1_DeleteOptions(0xc018adab48, 0xc10906b080, 0x50550e0, 0xc147596ff0, 0x43a55a0, 0x43a55a0)
	/home/prow/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/apis/meta/v1/zz_generated.conversion.go:323 +0x183
```
still trying to fix it.
propagationPolicy was properly parsed from URLs before...  can you describe what led you to change this method?

original method won't auto generate  Convert_Slice_string_To_v1_DeletionPropagation in autoConvert_url_Values_To_v1_DeleteOptions method, and DeleteOptions has a member of *DeletionPropagation rather than DeletionPropagation

PropagationPolicy is of type `*DeletionPropagation` - that change actually seems to be a valid one.

That said the way how it works seems incorrect to me - it should look more like:
`Convert_Slice_string_To_Pointer_v1_Time`:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/apis/meta/v1/conversion.go#L267
While I prefer DeletionPropagation as PropagationPolicy
verified both master and this PR populate the value correctly when parsed from URL
This looks fine to me, though I would like to get explicit ACK from Jordan that this is how we would like to handle [in!=nil && len(in) = 0]

In practice, this method is only called with non-nil, non-zero-length slices, but we should remain consistent with previous behavior, so keep the `} else { ... = "" }` block.

On both master and the current state of this branch, query parameters have the following behavior:
* `?` -> nil
* `?propagationPolicy` -> &""
* `?propagationPolicy=` -> &""
* `?propagationPolicy=foo` -> &"foo"
* `?propagationPolicy=Orphan` -> &"Orphan"
restore the else block that sets the out value to an empty string
it's surprising/annoying we have to do this
I agree - but apparently it's needed (we do the same above for ListMeta)
Don't you need to check if `*input` is `nil` first?

We don't check if `*input` and `*output` are `nil` in conversion functions, e.g. https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/7e75a09db6dc13218b4f5e06493115ae96f83774/staging/src/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/runtime/conversion.go
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/7e75a09db6dc13218b4f5e06493115ae96f83774/staging/src/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/apis/meta/v1beta1/conversion.go
I will take another look to see where is it enforced.
